title: Privacy Policy
description: At SpeakTruth, we are committed to protecting the privacy and confidentiality of our users' data. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect information collected through our website and platform.

title: Information We Collect
description: We collect personal information from users when they sign up for an account, including their name, email address, and job title. We may also collect additional information, such as employee feedback and reports, through our platform.

title: How We Use Information
description: We use the information we collect to provide our platform and services, to communicate with our users, and to improve our platform and services. We may also use the information for research and analysis purposes to better understand user needs and preferences.

title: Sharing of Information
description: We do not sell or rent user data to third parties. We may share user data with third-party service providers who assist us in providing our platform and services, but only to the extent necessary for them to perform their services. We may also disclose user data if required to do so by law or in response to a court order or subpoena.

title: Data Security
description: We take data security seriously and use industry-standard security measures to protect user data. We employ a range of technical and organizational measures to protect against unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction of user data.

title: Changes to this Privacy Policy
description: Users have the right to access, update, and delete their personal information at any time. Users also have the right to opt-out of receiving marketing communications from us.
